scripts.postgres-start-all: concurrently "npm run postgresdb" "npm run postgres-node-server" "npm run client"
scripts.postgres-copydata: cd postgresdb && rm -rf postgresql_data && cp -fr copy-into-data postgresql_data
scripts.postgresdb: npm run postgres-copydata && cd postgresdb && docker-compose --env-file "../.env" up --build
scripts.postgres-export: cd postgresdb && node -r dotenv/config export.js dotenv_config_path="../.env"
scripts.postgres-clear-volume: cd postgresdb && docker-compose down && docker volume rm postgresdb_pgdata
scripts.postgres-clear: npm run postgres-export && npm run postgres-clear-volume && npm run postgres-clear-data
scripts.mongo-start-all: concurrently "npm run mongodb" "npm run mongo-node-server" "npm run client"
scripts.mongo-export: cd mongodb && node -r dotenv/config export.js dotenv_config_path="../.env"
scripts.mongo-clear-data: mv mongodb/mongodb_data/latest.csv mongodb/copy_into_data/latest.csv && rm -rf mongodb/mongodb_data && cp -r mongodb/copy-into-data mongodb/mongodb_data
scripts.mongo-clear-volume: cd mongodb && docker stop mongo1 && docker stop node-import && docker rm mongo1 && docker rm node-import && docker volume rm mongodb_mongodb_data && docker rm mongodb_mongodb_init
scripts.mongo-clear: npm run mongo-export && npm run mongo-clear-volume && npm run mongo-clear-data
scripts.NOTE: When running docker-compose down for mongo we get - Service 'node-import' depends on service '' which is undefined.
